scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && yarn build
scripts.test-smoke: cd client && yarn run test && yarn run test
scripts.fmt: cd client && yarn fmt && yarn fmt

scripts.check-prettier: cd client && yarn check-prettier && yarn check-prettier
scripts.check-lint: cd client && yarn check-lint && yarn check-lint
